string.text: Knife Maniac Seryoga
Hunting knife with a sharp razor blade, and engraved on the handle of the inscription - "Serge maniac."
Flash Drive
Description Stick
Documents
Research project "SHOW-13". Charts, formulas and notes, not allowing even understand what "SHOW-13".
Documents
This is the second part of the documents on the project "SHOW-13"
Sealed Case
Case with samples of the substance, developed under the project "SHOW-13"
The second case with samples of materials developed under the project "SHOW-13"
PDA

From: Captain Barykina
To: posse
Subject: Order
 
Detect and neutralize the fugitive scholars
 
According to intelligence data is well known that the two scientists managed to escape. One of them managed to escape in an unknown direction, and another was seriously wounded. He could not go far, so you need to comb the area within a radius of 1 km.

From: Colonel Musorenko
To: posse
Subject: Find materials on the project "SHOW-13"
 
Helicopter, you will be transferred to Amber. Then you have to break through the lab X16. Go there without the help of an experienced stalker is simply impossible so I hired a guide from the "Freedom". Once in the lab you'll need to find all the materials on the project "SHOW-13". After the operation be advanced to the point of evacuation.

To log in, enter your correct username and password.
 
Username: ********
Password: ********

From: Konstantin Mayhem
To: The Punisher
Subject: Exponential penalty
 
Everything is going according to plan. The military believe us and think that we know nothing about "SHOW-13". Soon we will have the money, and after the war will see a record of execution, the base of "Duty" will cease to exist. After solving these problems will be thinking about Lucas.
 
Now you must save to video brutal massacre "Duty" on helpless soldiers. Do not forget to burn after the execution dolgovskie rags. You understand that if they can find.
 
I'll be at Yantar, at the entrance to the lab X16. Warriors told me that there may descend mercenaries. Apparently, the lab is something left. Also, it seems to me that I Musorenko clearly something not agree. Where mercenaries learned about "SHOW-13"?

From: Colonel Musorenko
To: assault force
Subject: Capturing case with samples of "SHOW-13"
 
According to data received from the stalkers of the group "Liberty" became known that they did not manage to get a case of Plakhova. If you believe them, Plakhova leaving the lab X16 met a group of heavily armed mercenaries who were aware of its cargo. At gunpoint, they took possession of the samples SHOW-13 and fled. Your task is to intercept and destroy the group before they have time to take the goods out of the zone.

According to fresh intelligence, a group of mercenaries intercepted the cargo, recently seen at the Wild Territory. I order you to seize the goods, but a group of mercenaries to destroy. After the seizure, you should as soon as possible to deliver samples SHOW-13 in our research group at SRI "Agroprom".
General Vlasov
Plans
Zhuravlenko
Serega Maniac
Kostya Lawlessness
Heard anything new during my absence?
Yes. I myself would like to tell you, but shook it and forget. Do you remember, was you mess with the military to "agricultural industry?
Well?

So, now they're back out there looking for something. Dart everywhere and stalkers plaguing them there. This is one of the neutrals told me. And these days are ours, from the "debt", stuck in the dungeons, artifacts search, you know, "Kissel" there good "Mica" is born, and Elektra - Bengal Lights "throws, but seems to have their fighters and pressed. Three at once is not, and quite good stalkers. For them, a detachment had gone, one must bury guys like human beings, and also - with the ends ... I thought maybe Go check it out? You stalker grated, belted with a crowbar.
Certainly check it, I would only ammunition.
No problem. What for?
Nato, 5,56.
Our native, 5,45.
PAB or JV.
That hold, seven boxes of happiness. Well, then, go on Agroprom. There on the factory Dolgovtsy 'parking would be arranged. Talk to them. Let them explain the situation.
Realized.
You know, the bartender, come the next time I have, and so full of affairs.
Yes blimey...!
Cool stalker! You like this was?
I came at the request of Barmen. Find out what happened here.
A-ha-ha-ha-ha-ha ... Kopec! Look around! Warriors killed all my friends ... that's what happened here! You blind or something, bitch?
You're a speech track of something!
Fuck you on ....!
Greetings.
And I love you.
Do not be offended by them. Guys first got into such a zavarushku and just want to survive. This is normal.
And I love you. You - the same unit, which came after missing stalkers?
Okay, I understand. You came for the three missing stalkers?
Yes. They descended into the caves, but we do not have time. Military such nix on to it.
Nix? Why? They're looking for something?

If at the fair, I do not care. Figured out myself if you want. We are returning to base. I would like to pick up the dead bodies of friends, but do not want to risk survivors. Generally, if you decide to get into the dungeon, speak with my sniper. He is near here.
I'll do that.
No thanks.
Then I tell him that you would come. He does not talk to strangers.
Well.
Nifiga it is not normal - a senior sauce. Nakostylyat-to puppies, so your hands do not want to soil.
I see you, stalker, are not in themselves.
Catch a crab! Listen to the conversation is ... you do downstairs?
In the dungeon going?
Yes.

I would not advise you to go there. All war survivors after a battle with us, leave it there. And more ... similar to what they had mined the entrance to the pit. Our guys are there for a couple of charges at the entrance was removed, but to stay still.
Damn! If so, have to crawl round ...
Is that so.
Do not shoot! Do not shoot me, please!
Peace! I'm actually not even going.
Praise God in me and so today all too often shoot ... but as the soldiers at the bottom? You killed them! So you saved my life! Thank you! Thank you very much. Let me kiss you!
Why such unbridled desires? "women painted modesty, hyih.
I just wanted to express my gratitude.
"Thank you" would suffice. Better tell me why this is suddenly the military wanted to kill you?
Frankly, I do not know ...
How's that?

The fact that we have with colleagues and a group of soldiers arrived in the laboratory of X-18 to clarify certain circumstances, to work with one drug. On the purpose of the expedition were to know only the leader of our group and myself. Then the soldiers came down directly into the laboratory, while the remainder stayed with us. And then began the strange. I overheard a conversation by a few soldiers, and from scraps of their conversation it became clear that they too know about the drug, because several times voiced its name - Heat 13. And they spoke about him only estimating its cost, the figure sounded fantastic. I was concerned about it and I went looking for our leader, he then walked over to the samples. I had walked far enough, when I heard gunfire in the side of the hangar. As quickly as possible, I went back and carefully looked into the hangar. God ... I will never forget what I saw ... The soldiers shot my defenseless colleagues, seeking shots to the head injuries ... I panicked and started running, I noticed. Far away I could not, in such a suit did not run much, and I had to hide from them in the local underground. Since then, I sat out here and wait until they stop searching. I heard a conversation a couple of soldiers, came down here - they said they wanted two, and I realized that survived even some of my colleagues, and it has not yet been found. If you survive, try to find it.
Hence, dolgovtsam just unlucky and they were here at the time when the military looking for you.
How "Dolgovtsam?
t does not matter. You, by the way, he stammered about money?
I see you are only interested in it!
Well ... Money is always an interesting topic for conversation.
All you have stalkers only swag da privarok. And I thought I ...
Yes, it's not even money. Bothered me to trample the Zone. Cottage by the river and I want to ... In general, I'll go look for it your "SHOW-13"
Understandable. Okay, thanks again for your help. Only I would not advise you with this contact, it is dangerous.
Yes me the danger is not the first time. Well am healthy!

Okay, let me start from the beginning. Originally, "SHOW-13 'was not fighting the virus. It was developed as part of the fight against AIDS. In general, "SHOW-13 'is a hybrid of man-made harmless virus and AIDS virus. The original virus itself is not dangerous. The immune system can easily fight with him in consequence of the fact that it was created on the basis of existing in nature, and accustomed to the human body the virus is spread by airborne droplets. But the source of the virus is the exclusive property - it can change the structure of other viruses, making them similar to his, and since he is easy to fight the immune system, then theoretically it can be used to defeat any disease. This is the original virus was obtained by chance and scientists wanted to put it in the service of man for peaceful purposes, but when the results of an experiment with rats fell into the hands of the military, they moved the rails on the military track. And the results were disappointing. "SHOW-13 ', getting into the body, hit certain areas of the brain and the media did not sensitive to pain (this is the property of the military wanted to instill soldiers), but in most cases the virus is suppressed almost all the intellectual activity of man. Some were lost even the basic instincts like food needs. And unfortunately, the vaccine he had not yet established, since work on the project were not completed until the end ...

Well ... theoretically, the antidote is your body. Indeed, experiments on humans have shown the results of the following items - the death rate was about 50%, 48% of test subjects lost their minds or become sick AIDS and only 2% of the subjects survived, but ... were still doomed. After the virus was struck central nervous system.
Would you like to say that I got to the 2%?

It seems that way. But do not think that "SHOW-13" took you a really short time. Do not lose hope, judging from the reports you can live for decades, and the band - an unusual place, then even ordinary sickness pass outside the box. And here's what I wanted to tell you. Work on "Znoyu-13" led my supervisor, academic Shelestov, and I know he's going to come into the Zone to conduct some of their experiments. If by that time I'll be still alive, then introduce you to him, maybe he could help. But how can you find?

Dump for a bar of 100 X-ray, I will leave the bartender documents, through him, and we will keep in touch. When going to talk to him mention of the word "heat ", it will be conditioned signal. Well, am!
Pppomogite ... pppozhaluysta ...
How are you?
I greet you, a stalker!
And I love you! Listen, you do not know whether you're a stalker, who recently went to the lab x18?
Yes, I know! You seem you mean Serega maniac. I see that after going to x18, he became a legend.
Probably ... and where is he?
By Sidorovich went. Do you know him a little missed.
Clear. Well, thanks for the information the stalker.
Sidorych! To you went stalker, nicknamed "Maniac"?
Yes. Visited recently ... and you know about it from?
It does not matter. He said where you going?
Of course not! Since when stalkers have reported to me about where the others go? Although he said he was going to make a halt ... here ... the cordon ...
Well, you see! And you say that you stalkers do not report.
It's just I'm so considerate. You'd better tell me why he needed you?
The point I have for him.
Good day!
Hello. Maniac?
The same. Looking for me, or what?
Like...
And what is required?
I've got to see you a couple of questions about x18. For example, who killed a military at the entrance to the lab?
And that I killed them ... and secretion of do not.
So just?
So just!
And for what? If not a secret.
Well, not exactly a secret, but also confess to you I'm not going.
Clear. And about the door code can tell you something.
Warriors locked door. They put the time to protect yourself ... I have it, however, did not stop.
But...
That "but"? You would not have done something if they killed your brother.
So that's what it was. In the "Zone" Many have lost loved ones, but the maniacs in this case did not get.
If you're not familiar with the matter of fact, it is better to be silent. Or I'll help you shut up.
Listen, a stalker, I really need to get into that lab, and the door closed. Need a code.

Code? About the code, I've heard something. At that moment, when I went to the lab, one of the officers just exhibited time. He said that the door is closed only in case of emergency, and someone always stayed outside. Code from the door - "Battle of the Neva. " I understand it the date of the battle had in mind ... That's all.
"Battle of the Neva" means ... try ...
And why are you lost something?
Yes, I do not know ... until ...
Professor, there's talk.
Yes, yes...
Where in the county as a zombie?

When the light was turned off at Yantar, here pulled stalkers ... for the rich swag, but ... from the laboratory were selected controllers. Initially, about no one knew, and many travelers complained of hallucinations, and we decided that it was the residual effect of radiation, but later began to appear on the frequent skirmishes with the controllers. Well, it is easy to guess the consequences.
I'm back, Professor.
Very glad to see you. You have found the answers to your questions?
I am afraid that the issues become even more.
You did not find anything?
Found...
Will look?
Yes, please.
No, it is unnecessary.
God!
That?
"SHOW-13" - this terrible biological weapons. Just look at the pictures!
Its tested on humans?!
Yes ... as stated in the protocol - to prisoners.
Rotten deal.
Listen, Marked One, these documents must not fall into the hands of bad people. Give them to me and I will convey them to the authorities.
Authorities can not, because they were interested in "SHOW-13". There. Read what he wrote one of the soldiers in his diary.
It can not be ... military wanted to test "SHOW-13 'in the Zone? They are mad? Here, people!
Many guinea pigs.
In this impossible to believe. The territory of the Chernobyl zone to be unsuitable for living another 24 000 years, and various tests will only aggravate the situation ...
Do not despair professor, after all documents have.
Documents - yes, but the samples that were used during the tests, still buried in the depths of the Zone. They need to find the earlier war.
I think I know a man who could help. Does not appear if you have prior to my arrival stalker factions of Liberty?
Yes, come. Like you, interested in zombie activity.
Do not know where he went?
Unfortunately not ... but it seemed he wanted to go down to the lab.
Stalkers I have not met.
Then, perhaps, he is still looking for the entrance to the laboratory.
Perhaps...

None. For starters, you can share the their base for the presence of unattended wallows in electronics. Anything can happen - someone forgot or left unattended your computer. If you have a good relationship with freedom, then the labor to enter the base you will not be. Especially if you're caught in this business, you probably decide that you just want to earn extra money by selling, and if I burn down - then the conversation will be quite different.

Let a professional do it. So ... So ... casket, then just opened. Look for anything about the disorder. We are waiting and ... information about it, but there are news about the stalker from his group, which was, as written here, dolgovskoy "six". Its exact location is not, but we know that he is hiding in the army warehouses. Referred to an abandoned village, but no details. Apparently somewhere in there it was last seen.

I do not know. Himself would have wanted that bastard to find. But there is little thought. You can kill two birds at once. Do not want to help the cattle out of debt, but ... Lawlessness planned to provoke a military attack on the bar. For this, he took hostage a number of soldiers, and dressed in dolgovtsev decided to punish them. It will be filmed on video and sent a soldier.

You kin have seen enough American or what? Listen, I tell you what. You see these guys? If you rypneshsya, you are razed to the ground. That's it. A case that the case ... The warriors of it ask them if they needed it, too, want - to catch up, they moved toward the Wild Territory. I myself would have gone, but the forces are not enough, do not beat them to us. And you do not advise it - debris and will not be asked as he was called.
